items.sentence: Could you please be quiet? I'm trying to study.
Wow! Look at that good-looking girl over there.
Tom said that he didn't want to sit next to me.
I wonder why Tom wanted us to watch this video.
I hope Tom isn't really planning on doing that.
We've been doing this for over three years now.
In case you ever change your mind, let me know.
When was the last time you built a sand castle?
Mary is one of the most beautiful women I know.
Tom shares his apartment with three other guys.
